title: Potential Google Keep Integration
body_html:
Potential Google Keep Integration

Concept:

  • Integrate Google Keep to capture quick notes and pertinent information.
  • Retrieve notes using the Google Keep API.
  • Break down notes into smaller chunks.
  • Analyze each chunk to extract key information.
  • Store parsed data in archival memory.

This integration could enhance Letta's ability to manage and utilize personal notes effectively.
